name: Flask of Chromatic Resistance
tooltip:
Flask of Chromatic Resistance
Item Level 60
Requires Level 50
Use: Increases your resistance to all schools of magic by 25 for 2 hrs.  You can only have the effect of one flask at a time.  This effect persists through death and stacks with all other resistance spells and items. (3 Sec Cooldown)
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 50
